verses.roman:
sabe kahe,--'haridāsa varṣa-pūrṇa dine
rātre uṭhi kāṅhā gelā, keha nāhi jāne"

synonyms: sabe kahe—everyone spoke; haridāsa—Haridāsa; varṣa-pūrṇa dine—at the end of one full year; rātre—at night; uṭhi—getting up; kāṅhā gelā—where he went; keha nāhi jāne—no one knows.
translation: The devotees all replied, "One night at the end of a full year, Junior Haridāsa got up and went away. No one knows where he has gone."
